article_title: McKesson Technical Charts Warn Investors to Reduce Holdings
article_text:
Eyes On McKesson (MCK): Highlighted Storm The Castle Stock

Trade-Ideas LLC identified McKesson (MCK) as a "storm the castle" (crossing above the 200-day simple moving average on higher than normal relative volume) candidate

article_metadata.description: Shares of McKesson has been trading sideways since setting an all-time high on March 23, and the weekly chart could end the week negative. Here's how to trade the stock.
article_metadata.author: Richard Suttmeier
